ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and of Ibrahim, who paid his dues in full:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And of Abraham who fulfilled his trust? --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and of Abraham, who lived up to the trust?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and about Abraham who fulfilled his duty (to God)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And of Ibrahim, who was most obedient?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And of Ibrahim who fulfilled all that:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and Abraham, he who paid his debt in full?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Abraham who paid his debt:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And with Abraham who kept his word:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And of Ibrahim who faithfully fulfilled?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and of Abraham, who fulfilled [his summons]:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And of Abraham who fulfilled his engagements?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And of Ibrahim (Abraham) who fulfilled (or conveyed) all that (what Allah ordered him to do or convey),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and Abraham, who paid his debt in full?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:37] and, the scrolls of, Abraham who fulfilled [his summons], [he who] completed what he had been charged with, as in: And when his Lord tested Abraham with certain words and he fulfilled them [Q. 2:124] (the explication of mā, ‘what’, is [the following]):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Abraham who paid his debt) i.e. he conveyed the message of his Lord and acted upon that which Allah had commanded him; it is also said that this means: he did as he was told in his dream vision:
